title: (EUW) Lunation eSports Early Tournament 5v5 SR #1          (13:30 Start)

embed.description: Greetings, fellow League player! Lunation eSports SR Tournament is a 5v5 pre-made teams and free agents tournament...

body:
Greetings, fellow League player!

Lunation eSports SR Tournament is a 5v5 pre-made teams and free agents tournament where everyone's fighting for a prize pool of 20k RP.

*You can join as free agent and you will get a random generated team for the tournament.*

Make sure to follow us:

On Youtube

On Battlefy
On Twitch.tv
On Instagram
On Facebook
Our Wesbite:LunationeSports

And join us:

On our discord server
If you have any problems with the tournament and you need assistance, you can find a fast answer on our

channel.

(This is also where you can head with your problems, just head to #Tournament_Support)

FireArmy : Ich will auch bei diesem Tournament mit machen und es startet erst ab 8 Teams also suche ich Teams die noch mitmachen könnten
(Bin nicht der Tournament Leiter)

replies.body: Kann ich hier ein ganzes Team eintragen oder werden die Teams random gemischt.
